entry.title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 10 at 1:59PM MDT until September 10 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL FREMONT COUNTY... At 158 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Anchor Dam, which is also 19 miles north of Pavillion, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts.
